title: Shopping Paradise Guide
description: From night markets to luxury malls - find those perfect Thai treasures!

locations.name: Chatuchak Weekend Market

locations.tip: 💡 Buy 3+ items for wholesale rates. Perfect for summer dresses & shirts!

locations.name: Chiang Mai Night Bazaar
locations.tip: 💡 Best place for authentic northern Thai crafts & textiles

locations.name: Walking Street Markets
locations.tip: 💡 Fisherman pants (150 THB), bikinis (200-400 THB), tank tops (100 THB)
